template.name: MVP
template.description: Creates an MVP screen with a presenter and a view.

parameter.name: Functionality Name
parameter.help: The name of the functionality that requires MVP views. Will used as a prefix.

parameter.name: Is there a parameter for the Activity?
parameter.help: Whether the screen needs a parameter from the previous one.

parameter.name: Paramater Name
parameter.help: The name of the parameter that the activity might get.

parameter.name: Is there a network call when the Activity starts?
parameter.help: Whether the screen needs a network call at startup.

parameter.name: Is list
parameter.help: Whether the screen contains a list

parameter.name: Has subheaders
parameter.help: Whether the list has one or more subheaders?

parameter.name: Is paging
parameter.help: Whether the list has paging thus a load more callback

parameter.name: Is showing details
parameter.help: Whether clicking the list items leads to a details screen

parameter.name: Show FAB
parameter.help: Whether the screen contains a Floating Action Button

parameter.name: List Class Name
parameter.help: The name of the class that will be fetched from the API and displayed in a list

parameter.name: List Class Name Plural
parameter.help: The name of the class that will be fetched from the API and displayed in a list, but in plural form

parameter.name: Parallax Header
parameter.help: The header contains a text and a large background image that disappears with a parallax effect
